name: Voicecraft failed due to deafness
script:
ak.songoff = true
cecho("\n    <white>--== TARGET IS DEAF ==--<reset>")
if not matches[2] or IsTargetted(matches[2]) then
	affstrack.score.deaf = 0
	ak.scoreup(matches[2])
end
matches: ^You sing a graceful maqam of el\'Jazira at ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems unmoved\.$
^You sense futility as you recite an obscure Kamleikan haiku to ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^In droning song you subject ([\w'\-]+) to a lengthy isorhythm\, without results\.$
^Weaving a complex counterpoint between instrument and voice\, you fail to instill anything like fear in ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^You invoke chaotic powers in a dark solo but fail to drain the essential magic of ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^You direct a poem of gluttony and decay at ([\w'\-]+)\, without success\.$
^You sing a pastorale of the fields and streams to ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems not to notice\.$
^You chant \'GIMMEGIMME\' at ([\w'\-]+)\, who does not react\.$
^You sing an irritating\, mind\-numbing ditty at ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems curiously unaffected\.$
^With a mournful cry you begin the requiem for Seleucar to ([\w'\-]+)\, who appears unmoved\.$
^Using a heavy tremolo you sing\, uselessly\, aiming at ([\w'\-]+)\'s (left|right) leg\.$
^With a frustratingly irrelevant vibrato you aim at ([\w'\-]+)\'s (left|right) arm\.$
^Your recitation of an epic tale of the heroism of Nicator has no effect on ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^With a wink\, you recite \"Ode to Elixirs\" to ([\w'\-]+)\, who looks on\, unimpressed\.$
^Starting with the characteristic Jaziran trill\, you sing a qasida of asceticism to ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems undaunted\.$
^With a gravity born of respect\, you sing of the saintly Imithia\, if only for yourself\.$
^Composing a few clever lines in your head\, you quickly sing a jaunty limerick at ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems to pay no notice\.$
^You sing a sonorous chant which fails to strip the defences of ([\w'\-]+)\.$
